attributes.action: Remove the right for over 65s to hold a PSV license.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish that the House of Parliament include within the P.S.V. licensing law, provision for removing the right for any person over the age of 65 Years old. To be allowed to hold a Passenger service vehicle license.This is due to the fact that my wife was injured as a passenger on a coach, after a crash on the M6 motorway, which was driven by a 72 year old man.
